data.text:
@SenatorHagerty @Jim_Jordan @JudiciaryGOP So "fair treatment" means shielding corporations from consequences after catastrophic failures? The subpoena isn't protection—it's impunity laundering.

While the admin decried "discrimination" in Nov 2025, Coupang's Dec 2025 data breach exposed 3,000 customers, forcing $1.18B in
